purpose: Educate developers on creating AI agents using Azure's AI Agent Service
principle: Leverages Azure AI services and Bicep for infrastructure as code to deploy and manage AI agents
reusability: Designed as a workshop with reusable templates and scripts for Azure AI deployment
limitations: Primarily an educational resource, not a production-ready solution; requires Azure subscription
name: build-your-first-agent-with-azure-ai-agent-service-workshop
description: Build your first agent with Azure AI Agent Service Workshop
highlight: Comprehensive workshop to build an AI agent using Azure AI Agent Service
